overview:
John Nugent is a seasoned technology executive with more than 15 years experience. John joins Syncapse from his previous leadership role as Vice President and General Manager EMEA for Responsys, a leading enterprise email service provider, where he grew the team and annual revenue by 200 per cent in three years.

Prior to Responsys, he held leadership roles at DoubleClick (a Google company), where he was responsible for revenue growth and advisory services for leading consumer brands across Europe.

At Syncapse, John is responsible for the Syncapse EMEA division, including corporate development, new business development and client services. As part of Syncapse’s executive leadership team, he is leading expansion in the UK and Europe including the recruitment of high performance teams, consistent with Syncapse’s goal of attracting and retaining the best talent in the industry.

John is a guest lecturer at the Institute of Direct Marketing and founding Chair of the Direct Marketing Association’s Social Media Council. He is regarded as one of the UK’s most experienced online marketers and is a regular speaker at industry events.
